sections.purpose: To examine and dissect small plant parts and crude drugs under low magnification.
sections.scope: Applicable to macroscopic and surface feature examination in Pharmacognosy.
procedure: Place the dissecting microscope on a stable bench in a well-lit area or switch ON built-in illumination.
Position the specimen on the stage or in a Petri dish.
Adjust the interpupillary distance and eyepiece focus for comfortable viewing.
Use coarse focusing knob to bring the specimen into clear view.
Manipulate the specimen with forceps or needles while observing through the eyepieces.
After use, remove specimens, clean the stage, and cover the microscope.
precautions: Avoid scratching the stage glass with tools.
Do not touch lenses with fingers; use lens tissue if cleaning is needed.
Keep liquids away from optical components.
Store in a dry place to prevent fungal growth on lenses.
Service the instrument periodically for alignment and lubrication.
